name: The Things We Do For Love

cards.name: Ser Davos Seaworth
cards.text: Ser Davos Seaworth cannot be killed.
cards.flavor: "A grey man... neither white nor black, but partaking of both. Is that what you are, Ser Davos?" <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Melisandre's Favor
cards.text: Terminal. Take control of attached character. Forced Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, sacrifice Melisandre's Favor. (Cannot be canceled.)

cards.name: Wintertime Marauders
cards.text: While there are more Summer plot cards than Winter plot cards revealed, Wintertime Marauders cannot be declared as an attacker or defender. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Wintertime Marauders is participating, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, choose a non-unique card and discard it from play.

cards.name: Conquer
cards.text:
Non-unique location only.
Take control of attached location.

cards.name: Spider's Whisperer
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After Spider's Whisperer enters play, choose an Ally character and discard it from play.
cards.flavor: "The Red Keep has ways known only to ghosts and spiders." <cite>Varys</cite>

cards.name: Wheels Within Wheels
cards.text: Action: Kneel a unique [lannister] character to choose and reveal a new plot card. (Max 1 per round.)
cards.flavor: "Sometimes the best way to baffle them is to make moves that have no purpose, or even seem to work against you. Remember that, Sansa, when you come to play the game." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>

cards.name: Prince's Loyalist
cards.text: Prized 1. Stealth. Immune to events. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, pay 2 gold to cancel those effects.

cards.name: You Murdered Her Children
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, choose an attacking character and discard it from play (cannot be saved). Then, search its controller's hand and deck for any number of copies of that character and discard them. Shuffle that player's deck.

cards.name: Samwell Tarly
cards.text: No attachments except Raven. Action: Kneel Samwell Tarly to look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card in your hand, if able. Then, place the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Old Bear Mormont
cards.text: Action: Kneel Old Bear Mormont to choose and stand another [thenightswatch] or Lord character. Reaction: After a character you control is killed, stand Old Bear Mormont.

cards.name: Catelyn Stark
cards.text: Action: During an [intrigue] or [power] challenge in which you are the defending player, put Catelyn Stark into play from your hand knelt, participating as a defender. At the end of the phase, if Catelyn Stark is still in play, return her to your hand.

cards.name: Snow Castle
cards.text: Action: Kneel Snow Castle to choose a [stark] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each [stark] character you control.

cards.name: Mad King Aerys
cards.text: Prized 1. Renown. Mad King Aerys cannot be killed unless an opponent controls a Lord or Lady character, or Ser Jaime Lannister. Dominance Action: Kneel Mad King Aerys to choose and kill a Lord or Lady character. (Limit once per round.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2012 Joust World Champion, John Bruno.

cards.name: The Hatchlings' Feast
cards.text: Action: Choose 3 characters without attachments. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR, one gets -2 STR, and one gets -3 STR.

cards.name: The Queen of Thorns
cards.text: While The Queen of Thorns is standing, opponents cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges against you.

cards.name: Olenna's Study
cards.text:
Each player may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge each round.
Non-unique characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders in [intrigue] challenges.

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Stealth. Littlefinger does not kneel when declared as an attacker. Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate, kneel Littlefinger to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Vale Refugee
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After dominance is determined, if you did not win, discard Vale Refugee from play unless you pay 2 gold.
cards.flavor: "No one can hurt me as long as I stay here." <cite>Robert Arryn</cite>

cards.name: High Ground
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel High Ground to choose and stand an Army character.
cards.flavor: Lord Tywin almost always chose to command the reserve; he would take the high ground and watch the battle unfold below him, committing his forces when and where they were needed most.

cards.name: King's Landing
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal a location, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.flavor: Now the city covered the shore as far as Catelyn could see; manses and arobrs and granaries, brick storehouses and timbered inns and merchant's stalls, taverns and graveyards and brothels, all piled one on another.

cards.name: Harrenhal
cards.text: Prized 2. If Harrenhal has 3 or more ghost tokens on it, sacrifice it. Interrupt: When the effects of a non-plot, non-agenda triggered ability would initiate, kill a character you own and control to cancel those effects. Place a ghost token on Harrenhal. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Sky Cell
cards.text: Terminal. Forced Interrupt: When attached character's controller would draw 1 or more cards, kneel attached character. Then, that player draws 1 less card instead. Attached character gains "Action: Kill this character (cannot be saved)."

cards.name: Heads on Pikes
cards.text: Prized 2. Dominance Action: For each character in his or her dead pile, each opponent discards the top 2 cards of his or her deck. (Max 1 per round.)
cards.flavor: ... even from a distance she could see the heads rotting atop the high red walls.

cards.name: Narrow Escape
cards.text: Action: Put each character that was killed or discarded from play this phase into play from its owner's dead or discard pile. An opponent may discard his or her hand (of at least 1 card) to cancel this effect. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Seductive Promise
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, choose a non-unique character controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that character. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Westeros Bleeds
cards.text: Dominance Action: Discard each character from play.
cards.flavor: When the old king was still alive, he'd not have stood for this.

cards.name: Aloof and Apart
cards.text:
Reduce the cost of the first character with printed cost 6 or higher you marshal each round by 2.
Each character you control with printed cost 6 or higher gains prized 1.

cards.name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You cannot include more than 1 copy of each event in your deck. Reaction: After you play an event, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2011 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.

cards.name: Knights of the Realm
cards.text: While you control more Knight characters than each other player, increase the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1. While you control fewer Knight characters than each other player, reduce the number of cards you draw in the draw phase by 1.

cards.name: The Long Voyage
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 100 cards. Reaction: After you draw cards in the draw phase, kneel your faction card to draw 1 card.

cards.name: Benjen's Cache
cards.text: When Revealed: If there are no Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Rioting
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the standing phase begins, discard each kneeling character from play (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Rule By Decree
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his or her hand until he or she has 4 cards in hand.

cards.name: Search and Detain
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a card without attachments controlled by the first player. Return it to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Art of Seduction
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot reveal a new plot card during the next plot phase.

cards.name: The Gathering Storm
cards.text: When Revealed: Each opponent may return his or her revealed plot card to his or her plot deck and reveal a new plot card.
